answers.author: Joseph McClure
answers.text:
Todd, we are in the network and I want to be sensitive to the system and our use of it. Having said that, we work as sub-consultants with people who have experience in your community whom we could (needless to say) recommend. Please advise if I can supply details.

author: Todd Smith
text: Greeneville, TN is seeking assistance in developing a downtown redevelopment plan.  Part of the concept is to include a tax increment finance district.  I need recommendations on good consultants who could help us develop a plan that encompasses marketing, street scape, traffic flow, and parking in our downtown area.
title: Downtown Redevelopment Plans
